insert into crm_user (user_name, user_account, user_password, dept_id, service_group_id, work_state, input_time, del_flag, p2p_mobile, p2p_user_id, remark) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{workState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{p2pMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p2pUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update crm_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, service_group_id = #{serviceGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, work_state = #{workState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, input_time = #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p2p_mobile = #{p2pMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p2p_user_id = #{p2pUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, user_account, user_password, dept_id, service_group_id, work_state, input_time, del_flag, p2p_mobile, p2p_user_id, remark from crm_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
